entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:38 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C

Humidity: 97 %

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm except locally 20 cm over higher terrain. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High zero.
